interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Badgley Mischka 1.7floz/50mL Body Lotion Toiletries for Bathroom, Guests, Hotels, Motels, and Lodging (30 pack) Review Date: 2021/08/22 Store: HOTEL EMPORIUM, INC. Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'HOTEL EMPORIUM, INC.', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '30', 'Item Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 6.38 x 3.82 inches; 4.26 Pounds', 'UPC': '653753520143'} Review Text: As they sent me the shampoo, this review is for that.
I think it’s excellent quality and has a super leather. It cleaned my hair beautifully and left it fairly soft, but that was with a rinse out conditioner, too.
I would highly recommend it. Review Title: Review for shampoo, not lotion. Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
Manicure and Pedicure Nail Clipper from POWERGROOMING - Powerful Trimmer for Thick and Thin Finger Nails and Toe Nails - Included Nail File and"Catcher" for Easy Cleanup (1 Pack) POWERGROOMING {'Brand': 'POWERGROOMING', 'Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Blade Edge': 'Straight', 'Blade Material': 'Stainless Steel', 'Target Audience': 'Women, Men', 'Package Dimensions': '3.8 x 1.3 x 1 inches; 3.21 Ounces', 'UPC': '653233212735', 'Manufacturer': 'POWERGROOMING'} I really loved the modern look of these clippers and file; however, i took one star away as the small nail file is not as sharp as I would have liked. I'm used to an old Revlon diamond file that works much faster.
As others have said, you can very easily remove the black base on the nail clippers if it seems unwieldy to you. It felt just fine to me. Super attractive clippers and file in a leather look case. Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack) Aussie ['Aussie Hairspray Instant Freeze Extreme Hold 7 Ounce (207ml) (2 Pack)'] {'Scent': 'Unscented', 'Liquid Volume': '7 Fluid Ounces', 'Item Form': 'Oil', 'Brand': 'Aussie', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '4.3 x 2 x 8.5 inches; 11.04 Ounces', 'UPC': '381519078040 787734409902 038785520000', 'Manufacturer': 'Aussie'} A tiny spritz of this not only holds my hair, but makes it look fuller.
I imagine it will last a long time; so, its also a great value.
I was always loath to try these freeze-type hairsprays, thinking they would look stiff, but this doesn’t.
No discernible fragrance, either. Exactly what I’ve been looking for. Fantastic hold with no residue or helmet head. COLORGRAM Artist Formula Auto Brow Pencil 0.25g- True Beauty K-Drama Makeup, Built-in-Spoolie, Clump-Free Formula, Softly Glides, Natural Look (01 Ash Brown) COLORGRAM ["Featuring a unique, triangular tip, Brow Definer's retractable pencil design is ideal for outlining and filling your brows in one fluid motion. The custom spooley end is created with a precise width and firmness to seamlessly blend color."] {'Brand': 'COLORGRAM', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Product Dimensions': '0.59 x 0.71 x 4.53 inches; 3.7 Ounces'} This was pretty impossible to use. It was so dry and hard that it wouldn’t even apply color to my brow. I
I would strongly suggest going with the Maybelline brow precise or the Maybelline brow ultra slim. Both of those are phenomenal and fairly priced. I think you can get them with Amazon’s subscribe and save, too. I could barely get this to apply to my brow…old product? Ivnil hair removal spray pack of 2 Ivnil {'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Anti-aging', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.32 x 2.28 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '752771042412'} I have been using this eye cream for months, day and night, and just adore it. It’s very emollient without being greasy at all.

I am usually sensitive to products and this gave me no negative reactions.

It only takes a tiny little bit to moisturize my upper and lower lids. Of course, I stay away from the eyelash area as I don’t want any of this in my eyes.

One jar has lasted for months.

The only thing I don’t like is the container as it means sticking my finger into it and I really don’t like that delivery system. I would vastly prefer if it had a small nozzle tube that could stand on its end. I know it wouldn’t look as fancy, but it would be far more user friendly. I have been using it for months and love it! Badgley Mischka 1.7floz/50mL Body Lotion Toiletries for Bathroom, Guests, Hotels, Motels, and Lodging (30 pack) HOTEL EMPORIUM, INC. {'Brand': 'HOTEL EMPORIUM, INC.', 'Item Form': 'Lotion', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '30', 'Item Volume': '1.7 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '9.53 x 6.38 x 3.82 inches; 4.26 Pounds', 'UPC': '653753520143'} As they sent me the shampoo, this review is for that.
I think it’s excellent quality and has a super leather. It cleaned my hair beautifully and left it fairly soft, but that was with a rinse out conditioner, too.
I would highly recommend it. Review for shampoo, not lotion.
profile:
**User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to exhibit a strong interest in grooming tools, particularly manicure, pedicure, and brow grooming products, while also exploring skincare items, especially those suitable for sensitive skin. Their recent purchase emphasizes an appreciation for quality products that enhance the grooming experience.

- **Performance Expectations:** With high standards for product efficacy, the user seeks reliable grooming and hair care alternatives. Their feedback on a recent purchase highlights their commitment to obtaining products that deliver impressive results for both hair and skin.

- **Practicality:** Convenience remains a key factor for the user, evidenced by their preference for user-friendly product designs and effective delivery systems that minimize mess or complications during application.

- **Gender Inclusivity:** The user actively supports diverse product offerings, maintaining a clear preference for grooming and skincare solutions that cater to all genders, demonstrating their commitment to inclusivity in their selections.

- **Overall Satisfaction:** Maintaining a proactive approach, the user expresses satisfaction with effective products while remaining aware of the challenges in finding high-quality options. They consistently provide valuable feedback, which helps shape their journey towards achieving stylish and effective grooming and skincare solutions, ensuring they remain informed and able to make confident purchasing decisions.
